events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle at a traffic intersection during peak hours.
Upon review, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to the nature of the reported collision.
An agent was assigned to the case to handle all communications and next steps relating to the auto accident claim.
The customer received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is now under review.
The agent requested a copy of the vehicle’s damage photos, police report, and driver's license for further assessment.
The customer submitted all requested documents promptly, including the police report and detailed images of the vehicle damage.
The claims department initiated a thorough investigation to verify the facts and assess the extent of the auto accident damages.
The investigation concluded with confirmation of fault and assessment of vehicle repair costs as submitted.
A settlement offer was proposed based on repair estimates and coverage limits to expedite resolution for the customer.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely communication throughout.
After review, the claim was officially approved, authorizing the payment process to commence immediately.
The payment was issued to the customer’s designated account covering all repair costs as per the approved settlement.
The claim was officially closed after payment confirmation and final customer acknowledgment of the resolution.
All documentation and records related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance.
